channel.title: Dumb error i always get for clients
channel.description:
Okay always get this lame error. And I mean ALWAYS. I get it for the latest runescape deob i got, csk client, rune-loft client, dog's client, rune-mafia client... Here's my error.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Press any key to continue . . .[/code
[/code]
I'm pretty sure what it is...well at least i think it is. I don't have my classpath set right? If any of these clients work 4 u, can u tell me ur classpath for your enviorment variables?
[size=15pt]Remember, you scratch my back i'll scratch urs. :cool:[/size]

item.title: Dumb error i always get for clients
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:9, topic:171871”]You can’t run the latest runescape deob, you don’t have any servers to play it with since none of the servers support it.[/quote]umm yes actually a server does support it…THE ACTUAL RUNESCAPE SERVER…yep the client can conenct to it but does not let you bank and trade.

Read full topic

item.title: Dumb error i always get for clients
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:6, topic:171871”]c:\Windows\System32;”C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;

Try adding that in 2nd box of environmental vironments name it is PATH[/quote][quote=“kiwon, post:7, topic:171871”]ok hold on a sec…

my PATH is

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;.;

and my CLASSPATH is

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.;

i got JDK 6.3

so… just change to whatever you have[/quote]okay tried both of these but no work. Man I got the latest runescape deob and i NEED it to work. Other ppl seem to get it to work but not me! I’m doomed…

Read full topic

my PATH is

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;.;

and my CLASSPATH is

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.;

i got JDK 6.3

so… just change to whatever you have

item.title: Dumb error i always get for clients
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

i got a csk client and in my run.bat i got this

@ECHO OFF
TITLE CSk-Client
color 0a
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar client
pause

if that helps any… prob not
